page.title: 15ONGAR POLICE STATION
page.content: { Ongar Police Station}has 21 officers and 3 civilians . There are 4 shifts, each has four offices and a sergeant. The station has{8 cars}and between four and five cars are on the road at any given time.Ongar, for the population, has an exceptionally low {crime rate}.But over{70%}of the offenders are under the age of {seventeen.}Ongar police station works in close cooperation with other Police station's in small villages and more rural areas.The detection rate of crime in the{local}area is very high, so much so that the{Home Office {published}a report about the station and its means of crime detection.The station also supervise's a local {"Neighbourhood Watch"}scheme, which has provided needed reassurance to Ongars inhabitants.
